resources.string: CREATE TABLE %1$s ( _ID INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT, SUBJECT VARCHAR, CONTENT VARCHAR, CRT_DT TIMESTAMP, MDFY_DT TIMESTAMP )
SELECT _ID, SUBJECT, CONTENT, CRT_DT, MDFY_DT FROM %1$s ORDER BY _ID DESC
UPDATE %1$s SET SUBJECT = %2$s , CONTENT = %3$s , MDFY_DT = %4$s WHERE _ID = %5$s
